hadiths.text: A'isha reported:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to recite (this supplication) as the words of incantation:" Lord of the people, remove the trouble for in Thine Hand is the cure; none is there to relieve him (the burden of disease) but only Thou

chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommended To Recite Ruqyah For One Who Is Sick
